io.simplesource.kafka.internal.streams.statestore

Interface CommandResponseStoreBridge<A>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KafkaStreamCommandResponseStoreBridge

    public interface CommandResponseStoreBridge<A>
    Provides access to the command response state store, as required for the CommandAPI. Implemented as a bridge so that we can use either a real KakfaStreams application or a TopologyTestDriver based implementation.

    • Method Summary
